Title: Hangman
Description: Hangman is a word-guessing game that can be played with two or more players. One player thinks of a word, phrase, or saying and keeps it secret, while the other player(s) attempt to guess the hidden word one letter at a time. If the guessing player(s) guess a letter that is in the secret word, the letter is revealed in its correct position. If the guessed letter is not in the word, a part of a hangman figure is drawn (usually on a gallows).

Title: BlackJack21
Description: Blackjack is a popular card game played in casinos and home settings. The objective is to beat the dealer by having a hand value as close to 21 as possible without exceeding it.

Title: Snake
Description: Snake is a classic arcade game that has been popular for decades. The goal is to control a growing snake and guide it to eat food while avoiding collisions with the snake's own tail or the boundaries of the game board.
